original_title: カタリヤ 都市伝説の女
overview: The death or injury of someone, a kidnapping, a tragedy, a bizarre murder, or a ghost story that actually happened. These stories have changed their forms and become urban legends that have been passed down in the daily swell of many people's lives for a long time. They are not mere gossip or fiction, but may be the real truth! The screams and exclamations of the beautiful girls are here, echoing!
title: Katariya: Toshi densetsu no onna
